@Mast3r_Drag00n_Sux1 You give Meiko too much credit. It's not "manipulation" if she wants it, and said manipulation wouldn't carry over after she sobered up unless she was into it from the beginning. I don't know how much you know about alcohol, but it's not a mind control weapon. It just makes people more honest. Besides, she straight up LIED about where she was when it first happened, then LIED about the second time being their first, and then LIED about it being the last. Hell, she even had the nerve to tell her coworker that she loved him. Does this really sound like the product of manipulation to you? And what do you mean it's Keiichi's fault for "not satisfying her"? If your partner isn't satisfying you (but they themselves are happy), then it's YOUR job to communicate your feelings or simply leave them. That's how relationships work.
